tool_description: Compiles and organizes regulatory documents into structured submission packages with proper indexing and cross-references.

submission_type.description: Type of submission (IND, CTA, protocol_amendment, safety_update)

document_paths.description: File paths to documents for inclusion

error_messages: Invalid submission type: Use IND, CTA, protocol_amendment, or safety_update
Invalid jurisdiction: Specify a recognized regulatory authority
Missing required documents: Ensure all mandatory documents are included in document_paths
Invalid priority designation: Use standard, expedited, or breakthrough
Document path error: One or more document paths are invalid or inaccessible
usage: Provide submission details and document paths to create a structured, compliant submission package with proper organization and indexing.

package_structure.description: Organized file structure of the submission package
